titles.title: Why Should I Worry Doubt And Fear (unique nice

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why should I worry doubt and fear Has God not caused His Son to bear my sins upon the tree The debt that Christ for me has paid Would God demand it be repaid And claim again from me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Redemption full the Lord has made And all my debts has fully paid From law to set me free I fear not for the wrath of God For I've been sprinkled with His blood It wholly covers me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For me forgiveness He has gained And full acquittal was obtained All debts of sin are paid God would not have His claim on two First on His Son my Surety true And then upon me laid{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So now I have full peace and rest My Savior Christ hath done the best And set me wholly free By His all-efficacious blood I ne'er could be condemned by God For He has died for me{/lang-eng}
